HomePage.Description1: Cloud-based solutions to streamline your workflows and day-to-day activities with our advanced automation tools.
HomePage.Description2: Easily access documentation for all organizational processes and custom-built tools, complete with comprehensive video tutorials.
HomePage.BugReport: Report any issues or bugs through our Bug Report board, for prompt resolution

bugReport.title: Bug Report
bugReport.subtitle: Report any issues or bugs through our Bug Report board, for prompt resolution

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Track the progress of our projects and upcoming features

zipFile.label: Zip File
zipFile.helperText: Insert the zip file to process

consoleDisplay.label: The save button in the console allow to export the logs and share it with the development team.

appDropdownHelper.schema: Select the schema containing the project
appDropdownHelper.node_p_calc: Choose the pole layer to process
appDropdownHelper.input_uuidPole: Optional: pole UUID for ponctual processing

address_breakdown.description: This app aims to compile an address breakdown as an Excel file along with a map screenshot.

dfn_boundaries.description: This app generates an AGOL DFN boundaries layer in Postgres for client import.

gps_to_shp.description: This app compiles and sanitizes ungraded GPS surveys into SHP files suitable for HLD.

gps_to_postgres.description: This app imports new graded GPS surveys or appends them to existing tables.

gps_to_postgres_refresh.description: This app performs a fresh GPS import, erasing old data.

hld_to_kmz.description: This app produces KMZ mappings for each DFN's HLD.

hld_to_postgres.description: This app imports new HLD data or appends it to existing tables.

hld_to_postgres_refresh.description: This app performs a fresh HLD import, erasing old data.

node_quantities.description: This app extracts node AER/UG length quantities in feet.

hp_by_splits1.description: This app compiles HP data by L1 splitters within a node.
hp_by_splits1.update: Resolve an issue when addresses are empty.

poles_numbering.description: This app creates a pole ID field based on the leaflet order.

midspan_calculation.description: This app recalculates project midspans based on pole updates.

dfn_poles_calculations.description: This app provides pole attachment suggestions and table pre-fill by DFN.

node_poles_calculations.description: This app provides pole attachment suggestions and table pre-fill by Node.

pole_class_length_estimator.description: This app estimates missing pole classes and lengths by DFN.

extract_data_dp.description: This app extracts pole owner and HP data counts for DP.

import_to_db621.description: This app imports DFN design data to DB621 and performs auto snapshots.

update_db621.description: This app updates DFN attributes in DB621.

snapshots_from_db621.description: This app generates snapshots from DB621.

dfn_bounds_db621.description: This app imports, updates, or deletes DFN boundaries.

resolve_null_geom.description: This app removes null geometries from the Postgres database.

recover_from_version.description: This app recovers deleted data from versioning in the Postgres database.

change_table_ownership_uniq.description: This app changes table ownership and permissions from/to UNIQ in the Postgres database.

clean_table_ownership.description: This app cleans table ownership and permissions in the entire schema of the Postgres database.

postgres_versioning.description: This app enables versioning for untracked schemas and tables in Postgres.

gps_to_shp.description: This app compiles and sanitizes ungraded GPS surveys into SHP files suitable for HLD.

gps_to_postgres.description: This app imports new graded GPS surveys or appends them to existing tables.

gps_to_postgres_refresh.description: This app performs a fresh GPS import, erasing old data.

node_poles_calculations.description: This app provides pole attachment suggestions and table pre-fill by Node.

resolve_null_geom.description: This app removes null geometries from the Postgres database.

recover_from_version.description: This app recovers deleted data from versioning in the Postgres database.

extract_bom_summary.description: This app creates a BOM summary from a zip file containing AutoCAD extracted shapefiles.

DocsUsageGuidelines.guidanceParagraph: This guide will help you navigate and utilize the documentation effectively to make the most out of our automated tools.

understandingDocumentation.title: Understanding the Documentation
understandingDocumentation.paragraph: Our documentation is designed to be user-friendly, providing you with all the information needed to use our tools efficiently. Here's how to get started:

searchFunctionality.title: Search Functionality
searchFunctionality.description: Use the search bar at the top of the documentation page to quickly find specific topics or tools.

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.description: Use the sidebar to navigate between different sections of the documentation. Each section represents a specific client or project and is further organized by platform type and tool for easy access.

examplesTutorials.title: Examples and Tutorials
examplesTutorials.description: Look for examples and tutorials within each tool's documentation to see the tool in action.

permissionsAccess.title: Permissions and Access
permissionsAccess.paragraph1: Access to specific documentation is controlled by permissions.
permissionsAccess.paragraph2: Without the proper permissions, the documentation page will still be accessible but deactivated, with content blurred out to protect restricted client information and adhere to confidentiality policies. This approach serves multiple purposes:

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: Ensures that sensitive information remains protected and only accessible to authorized users.

controlledAccess.title: Controlled Access
controlledAccess.description: Maintains strict control over who can view and interact with the app's content.

gettingMostOutTools.title: Getting the Most Out of Our Tools
gettingMostOutTools.paragraph: To maximize the benefits of our automated tools, consider the following tips:

startBasics.title: Start with the Basics
startBasics.description: If you are new to automation, begin with our introductory guides to understand the fundamentals.

exploreAdvanced.title: Explore Advanced Features
exploreAdvanced.description: Once comfortable, explore more advanced features to enhance your workflows.

useSupport.title: Use Support Resources
useSupport.description: If you encounter any issues or have questions, consult our FAQ section or reach out to our support team.

feedbackContributions.title: Feedback and Contributions
feedbackContributions.paragraph1: Your feedback is invaluable to us. If you have suggestions on how we can improve our documentation or tools, please let us know.
feedbackContributions.paragraph2: Additionally, if you've created workflows or solutions that could benefit others, consider sharing them with us. We could be able to add them to the platform, making them available to all users.

AppsUsageGuidelines.guidanceParagraph: This guide will help you navigate and utilize our web apps effectively to maximize their potential.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with the Apps
gettingStarted.paragraph: Our web apps are designed to be user-friendly, providing you with all the tools needed to manage your tasks efficiently. Here's how to get started:

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.description: Use the sidebar to navigate between different apps. Each section represents a specific client or project and is further organized by platform type and tool for easy access.

examplesTutorials.title: Examples and Tutorials
examplesTutorials.description: Look for examples and tutorials within each app. When available, examples and video tutorials will present the tool in action.

permissionsAccess.title: Permissions and Access
permissionsAccess.paragraph1: Access to specific apps is controlled by permissions.
permissionsAccess.paragraph2: Without the proper permissions, the app will still be accessible but deactivated. This approach serves multiple purposes:

hintFunctionality.title: Hint of Functionality
hintFunctionality.description: Users can see what the app does, which can spark curiosity and interest.

ideaGeneration.title: Idea Generation
ideaGeneration.description: Users can explore existing apps to see if their ideas are already implemented or if there is room for new suggestions.

feedbackSuggestions.title: Feedback and Suggestions
feedbackSuggestions.description: Users are encouraged to provide feedback or propose new ideas based on their exploration of the app.

maximizingBenefits.title: Maximizing the Benefits of Our Apps
maximizingBenefits.paragraph: To get the most out of our web apps, consider the following tips:

startBasics.title: Start with the Basics
startBasics.description: Familiarize yourself with the basic features before exploring advanced functionalities.

utilizeIntegrations.title: Utilize Integrations
utilizeIntegrations.description: Take advantage of integrations with other tools and services to streamline your workflows.

stayUpdated.title: Stay Updated
stayUpdated.description: Keep an eye on updates and new features to continuously improve your experience.

feedbackContributions.title: Feedback and Contributions
feedbackContributions.paragraph1: Your feedback is invaluable to us. If you have suggestions on how we can improve our web apps, please let us know.
feedbackContributions.paragraph2: Additionally, if you've created workflows or solutions that could benefit others, consider sharing them with us. We could add them to the platform, making them available to all users.
